replies.body: A new aatrox skin would be nice :'-(..feels like im the only one who uses him
He is a little bit too new, but he might get one in the next 5 months or so{{champion:266}}
*cough* striker lucian *cough*

Yeah, I love football, but I would have preferred an Arcade {{champion:236}} skin. Similar retro feel as Arcade {{champion:120}} {{champion:37}} but he has NES Zappers and has N The Game Master's duds.
Arcade {{champion:10}} : Her ult would play the Mario invincibility music and give you rainbow skin.

The only ADC Arcade skin should be Arcade {{champion:21}} 

She would be wielding Red and Blue arcade handguns from Time Crisis.

Eggplant Wizard Ryze? King Hippo Gragas? Kid Icarus Ezreal? Bomberman Ziggs? Simon Belmont Garen?

And of course: Rammus The Hedgehog

Arcade Ezreal, complete with powerglove? 
I'd play it even though I hate ezreal
JINX ARCADE SKIN!!! She was born for it

lucian is a really new champ and he got striker lucian
I use him (though I'm total garbage in general).  I'm hoping Riot gives him a Soul Reaver skin in the style of Raziel.  A mouth-concealing shawl and ethereal blade would be badass on him.
I don't even use AAron but I would pay money for that. Soul Reaver is my {{item:3072}} Kappa
you done messed up AAron
He isnt very good against the most chosen top laners
Doesnt matter if he's not,people still like him enough to buy a skin

And if you play him right you can win lane against anyone. Isn't that what this game is about? Being a better summoner, not picking a better champion? (although I know it doesn't always happen like that.)
Kha has been out for over a year and only has one skin :(
Just sitting here and waiting for Moriuz's story....
Still waiting...
You ain't da only one

Hey riot, make a storm fury shyvana skin, where her w would be a tornado with lightning swirling around, you could make particles grey with some lightning in it possibly
They could call it Static Shyv.
Make it now or RIOT
What if.....They made a Samuri Jack Yasuo{{champion:157}}  skin? That'd be cool :D
Copyrights doe. For a lot of the skins people are comin up with haha

Copyrights weren't an issue when they boldface copied Robot Unicorn Attack in Hecarim's Arcade skin, or copied Night Crawler from X-Men in Rengar's Night Hunter skin, or copied Rengar and Kha'Zix straight out of Alien vs. Predator. Not to mention the King Rammus skin, which is an obvious play on Bowser. Just sayin' Riot's never been concerned with copyrights in the past :P
Theres a massive legal difference between alluding to classic characters, and straight up taking one out of context and making a skin out of it.
I'm wondering why they don't have this for Yasuo or Yi. It seems so appropriate XD

I think that they should maybe a disco group kinda like Pentakill, or at least a theme like the mafia theme.One definite member that needs a skin would be Disco Syndra, maybe some dark champs such as Lissandra(Ult would be like a dance floor Q_Q). I think this would be cool to see and it would also be a new theme of skins.
Riot, plz. More arcade skins {{champion:37}} {{champion:120}}
{{champion:222}}
Am i the only one who hates top laning against jayce?
No he's annoying with the pokes...like that one friend you have on facebook that can't take a hint
I think zac needs a skin he has only one and it just makes him look purple {{champion:154}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
{{champion:154}} "I should get a suit" ...

I think a skin playing off of this Zac quote could be fun.  

Zac could have a "Bouncer" skin, which would give him a suit and also have the fun play on words giving his tendency to bound about the battlefield.

If they could slightly update his lines to reflect the new suit and a restrictive Bouncer attitude that would be funny.

- "Let me show you the door"
- "Whoa, whoa, whoa.  I can't let you go dressed like that!"
- "No shirt, no goo, no service"
- "I should get another suit"...

As he gets bigger the suit could rip in the sleeves or something too.

Upon buying a {{item:3083}}  - "Oh man... looks like I grew three sizes today"

And then, because it's funny, give every one of the globules he spawns little vests and bowties.

This was supposed to be a short comment...
my friend and I thought it would b cool if zac got a skin that was all white but you could draw on him. I don't know if that could really work on the programming end, but it would still b awesome
I dont think riot would allow that considering how this community is in game lol, they would probbably be drawing inapropriate things all over him.
majin buu zac pls{{champion:154}}
Ooh, they could do a whole DBZ themed bundle... Majin Buu Zac... Yajirobe Gragas.... I mean, they wouldn't even have to rip off popular characters, and I bet people would buy.... I know I would.
make a storm fury yasuo skin pls
